channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Fame and Fentanyl
channel.desc: An unflinching look at the fentanyl crisis and its profound impact on our society and culture; from high-profile celebrities and artists such as Prince, Angus Cloud, Tom Petty, Michael K. Williams and families from all walks of life, more than 70 thousand Americans die of fentanyl poisoning each year; this 2-hour special, hosted by Ice T, shares the horrific toll and heart-breaking stories of those directly affected by the deadly substance.
